description: Young urban digital lead with price objection
plan: Digital-first approach: Instant quote (< 2 min), mobile-optimized signup. [Doc3]
Value emphasis: Demonstrate ROI through real customer scenarios. [Doc6]
Multi-channel follow-up: Phone (35% conversion), email (15%), chat (25%). [Doc1]

plan: Hybrid approach: Online quote + optional agent consultation for complex needs. [Doc6]
Family protection angle: Multi-policy bundling (15-25% savings), dependent coverage. [Doc4]
Multi-channel follow-up: Phone (35% conversion), email (15%), chat (25%). [Doc2]

description: Senior rural lead unsure about coverage
plan: Trust-building: Agent-led consultation, printed materials, family involvement option. [Doc4]
Family protection angle: Multi-policy bundling (15-25% savings), dependent coverage. [Doc2]
Education-first close: Coverage calculator, needs assessment quiz. [Doc1]
